response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and quality, it's truly a valuable asset. Given its worth to me, I propose a price of $120 for this product. This offer reflects a balance between the value I place on it and the benefit you'll gain from it. I believe this is an opportunity for both of us to achieve satisfaction. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 120}
